body.name: BITEPASS 1080p Wired Video Doorbell Camera with Ring Chime, Human Detection, 2-Way Audio, FHD Live View, Night Vision, DIY Installation (Wiring Required), Cloud Storage, Indoor Outdoor Surveillance
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 15 mins
features: Protected Cloud Storage Option: Avail AES-128 encrypted cloud storage via an optional subscription (available separately). Delve into a 30-day complimentary trial, facilitating video recording, playback, and sharing.

Advanced Pre-Capture Capability: For those subscribed to our Cloud Storage, this doorbell begins recording upon sensing movement or when its button gets pressed. This allows you to view the events leading up to the primary incident, providing a more complete view.
Enhanced AI Human Recognition: Activate the AI function to distinguish humans from other moving entities, such as vehicles and animals.
Interactive Two-Way Talk: Connect with guests in real-time, from any location, facilitating smooth interactions.
Superior Night Vision: Four infrared LEDs combined with a smart IR sensor allow continuous surveillance, producing clear videos even in dimly lit conditions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Comprehensive Home Security Every package comes with a versatile doorbell chime. Position it anywhere in your home – whether it's the living room, kitchen, or veranda – to promptly get notified. Multiply your convenience by linking multiple chimes to one doorbell.

Secure Cloud Storage Cloud Storage - Our AES-128 encrypted cloud storage offers an enhanced experience through an optional subscription (available separately). Enjoy a complimentary 30-day trial for uninterrupted recording and sharing. Pioneering Pre-Event Recording - For our Cloud Storage patrons, this doorbell triggers recording at the slightest movement or button press. By doing so, it lets you capture the buildup to the main occurrence, delivering a well-rounded view.

Human Detection & Instant Notifications Smart Human Detection - Thanks to AI-driven technology, our system precisely detects human activity, disregarding inconsequential motions like moving cars or fluttering foliage. Instant Motion Notifications - Receive immediate updates on your mobile device upon motion detection, ensuring you're always in the loop about front-door happenings.

Real-Time 2-Way Communication & Prompt Alerts Interactive 2-Way Communication - Engage in real-time dialogues with visitors, no matter where you are. Prompt Alerts - Remain updated with instant notifications when someone presses your doorbell, or upon motion detection, keeping you connected to all front-door events.

Night Vision & Wide-Angle View Superior Night Vision - With four infrared lights paired with a smart sensor, our camera promises exceptional video quality, even in dim lighting, ensuring round-the-clock safety. Crisp Wide-Angle View - Experience live footage in stunning detail, courtesy of our broad-angle lens.

Simple Wired Setup Step 1: Power Off: Ensure the doorbell's power is turned off at the circuit breaker. Step 2: Install: Swap out your old doorbell and link the wires to your new Video Doorbell. Step 3: Configuration: Restore power and finalize preferences using the mobile app. Setup Requirement: Standard doorbell system or transformer with 7-24 VAC, 40VA max, 50/60Hz or 7-24VDC, 0.5A, 12W.
